info.name: OMF Theme Set
info.description:
A collection of themes for OMF

Current Themes:
Onemanga Classic 1 (Blue)
Onemanga Classic 2 (Red)
Onemanga Classic 2 (Red) (For OMF Red Classic)
Orange Carbon
info.additionalInfo:
Released on December 17, 2013

Updated on December 18, 2013
Added:
Missing colors for Onemanga Classic 2 (Red) With a few minor additions. 

New theme: Onemanga Classic 2 (Red) (For OMF Red Classic)

Updated on December 19, 2013
Fixed notification icon issue in both Classic 2 themes

Updated on June 07, 2014
Removed Winter theme
Added Orange Carbon theme
